name: 𝚜𝚘𝚞𝚛𝚜 𝚊𝚏𝚛𝚘𝚝𝚘𝚘
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com . You can leave it blank if you want , bot will use Ze's database for you.

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. Please don't use ascii characters

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v2 String Session from @C_5_bbot on Telegram.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: هنا ضع الايبي كي الخاص بحساب هيروكو من هذا الرابط https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: اسم التطبيق أول مربع كتبته خلي هنا نفسه وحروف صغيرة.

LOGGER_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.
